Paperwork handled — upgrade in one visit
Can I buy the scooter after the lease ends?
Yes! At the end of your lease, you have the option to purchase the scooter at a predetermined residual value, return it, or upgrade to a newer model.
What happens if I exceed the kilometer limit?
Our lease plans include generous kilometer allowances. If you exceed the limit, excess kilometers are charged at ₹2/km. You can also opt for unlimited kilometer packages.
We accept your old scooter or bike as trade-in. Our team will inspect it and offer you a fair credit value that will be deducted from your total lease cost.
Can I extend the battery warranty?
Absolutely! The standard battery warranty is 3 years / 50,000 km. You can extend it to 5 years / 80,000 km for an additional ₹2,999.
Yes, your security deposit is fully refundable at the end of the lease term, provided the scooter is returned in good condition with no outstanding payments.
Use promo codes like FIRST10 (10% off), ECO15 (15% off), or LULU5 (5% off) when booking. Apply them in the calculator to see your instant discount.
